    Aggregating EROIs by fossil fuel group Breaking down useful stage EROIs by sector or end-use Adding indirect or other energy requirements
  • Changelog

    Function reference

    All functions

    add_indirect_energy_to_erois()
    Adds indirect energy to the EROI values
    add_indirect_energy_useful_erois_by()
    Adds indirect energy to useful stage EROI values with given breakdown
    aggregate_final_stage_erois()
    Aggregates final stage EROIs by fossil fuel group
    aggregate_primary_stage_erois()
    Aggregates primary stage EROIs by fossil fuel group
    aggregate_useful_stage_erois()
    Aggregates useful stage EROIs by fossil fuel group
    calc_all_products_use_by_group()
    Calculates the use of energy products by group
    calc_avg_efficiency_by_ff_group()
    Calculates average final-to-useful efficiency by fossil fuel group
    calc_fec_from_ff_as_elec_by_group()
    Calculates final energy consumption of electricity from fossil fuel origin, by fossil fuel group
    calc_fec_from_ff_as_fuel_by_group()
    Calculates final energy consumption of fuel by fossil fuel group
    calc_fec_from_ff_as_heat_by_group()
    Calculates final energy consumption of heat from fossil fuel origin, by fossil fuel group
    calc_fec_from_ff_by_group()
    Calculates final energy consumption supplied by each fossil fuel group, including in the form of electricity and heat
    calc_primary_products_supply_by_group()
    Calculates primary energy supply for each fossil fuel group
    calc_share_elec_supply_by_ff_group()
    Calculates the share of electricity provided by each fossil fuel group
    calc_share_ff_use_by_product_by_group()
    Calculates the shares of each product use within each fossil fuel group
    calc_share_heat_supply_by_ff_group()
    Calculates the share of heat provided by each fossil fuel group
    calc_share_primary_ff_supply_by_product_by_group()
    Calculates the primary energy supply shares of each product within each fossil fuel group
    calc_shares_elec_by_ff_group()
    Calculates the share of electricity supplied by each fossil fuel within each fossil fuel group
    calc_shares_ff_by_group_inc_elec_heat()
    Calculates the share of use of each energy product within each fossil fuel group, including electricity and heat uses
    calc_shares_heat_by_ff_group()
    Calculates the share of heat supplied by each fossil fuel within each fossil fuel group
    calc_total_use_by_product()
    Calculates total energy use by product
    extract_tidy_industry_erois()
    Extracts industry level EROIs from tidy Input Output matrices
    extract_tidy_product_erois()
    Extracts product level EROIs from tidy Input Output matrices
    prepare_gma_for_shares()
    Prepares tidy iea data frame with Global Market Assumption for shares calculations
    push_to_useful_erois()
    Push final stage EROIs to useful stage EROIs
    tidy_AB_data_gma
    Tidy data frame for the AB data with the Global Market Assumption
    tidy_AB_dta
    Tidy data frame for the AB data with the Domestic Technology Assumption
    tidy_AB_erois_dta
    Tidy data frame containing EROIs for AB using the Domestic Technology Assumption
    tidy_AB_erois_gma
    Tidy data frame containing EROIs for AB using the Global Market Assumption

    Developed by Emmanuel Aramendia.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
